rukus.text: qul inni nuhitu an aʿbuda alladhina tadʿuna min duni l-lahi qul la attabiʿu ahwaakum qad dalaltu idhan wama ana mina l-muh'tadina
qul inni ʿala bayyinatin min rabbi wakadhabtum bihi ma ʿindi ma tastaʿjiluna bihi ini l-huk'mu illa lillahi yaqussu l-haqa wahuwa khayru l-fasilina
qul law anna ʿindi ma tastaʿjiluna bihi laqudiya l-amru bayni wabaynakum wal-lahu aʿlamu bil-zalimina

waʿindahu mafatihu l-ghaybi la yaʿlamuha illa huwa wayaʿlamu ma fi l-bari wal-bahri wama tasqutu min waraqatin illa yaʿlamuha wala habbatin fi zulumati l-ardi wala ratbin wala yabisin illa fi kitabin mubinin
wahuwa alladhi yatawaffakum bi-al-layli wayaʿlamu ma jarahtum bil-nahari thumma yabʿathukum fihi liyuq'da ajalun musamman thumma ilayhi marjiʿukum thumma yunabbi-ukum bima kuntum taʿmaluna
